mapper.insert: insert into party (leader_id, category_no, party_name, party_quota, party_description, party_filename, visibility_status) values (#{leader.id}, #{category.no}, #{name}, #{quota}, #{description}, #{filename}, #{visibilityStatus})
mapper.select: select party_no as no, leader_id as "leader.id", category_no as "category.no", party_name as name, party_cur_cnt as curCnt, party_quota as quota, party_status as status, updated_at as updatedAt, created_at as createdAt, party_description as description, party_filename as filename, visibility_status as visibilityStatus from party where party_no = #{value}

select party_no as no, leader_id as "leader.id", category_no as "category.no", party_name as name, party_cur_cnt as curCnt, party_quota as quota, party_status as status, updated_at as updatedAt, created_at as createdAt, party_description as description, party_filename as filename, visibility_status as visibilityStatus from party where category_no = #{categoryNo} and party_name = #{partyName}

SELECT p.party_no as no, p.leader_id as "leader.id", p.category_no as "category.no", p.party_name as name, p.party_cur_cnt as curCnt, p.party_quota as quota, p.party_status as status, p.updated_at as updatedAt, p.created_at as createdAt, p.party_description as description, p.party_filename as filename, p.visibility_status as visibilityStatus FROM party p JOIN user_party_application upa ON upa.party_no = p.party_no WHERE upa.user_id = "test" ORDER BY upa.created_at desc LIMIT 5;
